resources.string:
CO: Cast on stitches
k1: knit 1 
p1: purl 1
k2tog: knit 2 together
p2tog: purl 2 together
St st: stockinette stitch
ssk: slip 1 stitch, slip 1 stitch, knit those stitches through the back of the stitch
**: repeat the sequence as many times as written on the pattern
p3tog: purl 3 together
slwif: Slip 1 stitch with yarn in front
m1: Make 1 stitch
m1p: Make 1 stitch purlwise
kfb: Knit the front of the stitch and the back of the stitch
yo: yarn over
RS: Right side of the work
WS: Wrong side of the work
pm: Place marker
sm: Slide marker
